title: Stagecoach 2025 Livestream Schedule & Details
description: Here’s when to catch Lana Del Rey, Sturgill Simpson, T-Pain, Zach Bryan, Nelly, and more
author: Eric Torres
excerpt: Here’s when to catch Lana Del Rey, Sturgill Simpson, T-Pain, Zach Bryan, Nelly, and more
text: Producer Goldenvoice and Amazon Music have announced the livestream schedule for the 2025 edition of the Stagecoach country music festival in Indio, California. Live coverage will begin airing through Prime Video, the Amazon Music app, and Twitch today at 4 p.m. Pacific Daylight Time.For the first time, there will also be a rebroadcast of each afternoon and evening’s programming at 7 a.m. Greenwich Mean Time. Headlining this year’s event are Zach Bryan, Jelly Roll, and Luke Combs. Elsewhere on the bill are: Lana Del Rey, Sturgill Simpson, Shaboozey, T-Pain, Ashley McBryde, Nikki Lane, Sierra Ferrell, “Purple Gas” songwriter Noeline Hofmann, Backstreet Boys, Nelly (celebrating the 25th anniversary of Country Grammar), 49 Winchester, Goo Goo Dolls, and Creed.Catch up on Pitchfork’s coverage of Stagecoach’s sister festival, the Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival, with “The Best and Worst of Coachella 2025.”Channel 1 Schedule(All times listed in Pacific Daylight Time)*schedule is subject to changeFriday, April 25, 20254:10 PM - html:
Producer Goldenvoice and Amazon Music have announced the livestream schedule for the 2025 edition of the Stagecoach country music festival in Indio, California. Live coverage will begin airing through Prime Video, the Amazon Music app, and Twitch today at 4 p.m. Pacific Daylight Time.

For the first time, there will also be a rebroadcast of each afternoon and evening’s programming at 7 a.m. Greenwich Mean Time. Headlining this year’s event are Zach Bryan, Jelly Roll, and Luke Combs. Elsewhere on the bill are: Lana Del Rey, Sturgill Simpson, Shaboozey, T-Pain, Ashley McBryde, Nikki Lane, Sierra Ferrell, “Purple Gas” songwriter Noeline Hofmann, Backstreet Boys, Nelly (celebrating the 25th anniversary of Country Grammar), 49 Winchester, Goo Goo Dolls, and Creed.

Catch up on Pitchfork’s coverage of Stagecoach’s sister festival, the Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival, with “The Best and Worst of Coachella 2025.”

Channel 1 Schedule

(All times listed in Pacific Daylight Time)

*schedule is subject to change

Friday, April 25, 2025

4:10 PM - Nikki Lane

5:20 PM - Sierra Ferrell
6:10 PM - Dylan Scott
